casebody.data:
William S. MILLS, as Guardian ad Litem for Alex Pitts; Melissa Pitts and Jeff Pitts
v.
Richard DWANE, M.D.; Private Diagnostic Clinic, PLLC; and Duke University. No. 516P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Mark A. Davis, Raleigh, Charles R. Holton, Research Triangle Park, for Richard Dwane, M.D., et al. Donald H. Beskind, Karen M. Rabenau, Raleigh, for William S. Mills.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants on the 29th day of June 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of August 2005."
